comments.text:
###!!! ASSERTION: aOffset out of range: 'aOffset && *aOffset <= 1', file layout/generic/nsBRFrame.cpp, line 290

The assertion occurs when running the test
chrome://mochitests/content/a11y/accessible/text/test_singleline.html

http://tinderbox.mozilla.org/showlog.cgi?log=Firefox/1302704253.1302708830.29149.gz&fulltext=1
